towards the back dorsal surface of the fish and the curved side closer to the tail see picture use the yarn needle to attach the gill to the body when you work the rounded side of the gill make sure you leave one loop free per stitch attach bottom loop of each stitch to the body leaving top loop free attach green to right most stitch of curved side of gill cover in the free front loop single_crochet across slip stitch to body reverse single_crochet back slip_stitch to body and fasten_off repeat with second gill eyes make 2 with contrast worsted chain 2 6 single_crochet in second chain from hook fasten_off leaving a tail to attach to the body with position the eyes on each side of the body in front of the gills fins side fins make 2 with rainbow yarn - set up your initial slip knot several inches in yarn leave initial tail for attaching chain 5 treble_crochet in 5th chain from hook fasten_off attach to fish body below and slightly back from the outer curve of the gills forward ventral fins make 1 with green chain 5 fasten_off leaving shorn length of yarn on each end of chain weave chain to bottom of fish so that ends flop clear using a separate piece of yarn attach firmly to fish creativecommons-attribution-noncommercial-noderivitaves-4 0 lise mendel rear ventral fins make 1 with rainbow chain 8 leaving some free at each end of chain attach forward end to underside of body slightly behind side fins loop the chain so that it forms a single fin and thread loose yarn back a little bit so that it sticks out to form second fin secure with a little green yarn and trim second fin so that it does not reach to tail attachment point dorsal fins attach rainbow yarn to the back directly between the eyes slip_stitch in next two stitches going towards back of fish single_crochet in next three stitches half_double_crochet in 2 stitches double_crochet in 2 stitches treble_crochet in last stitch fasten_off and work in ends attach rainbow yarn a few stitches back slip_stitch single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet fasten_off and work in ends attach rainbow yarn a few stitches back slip_stitch single_crochet half_double_crochet fasten_off and work in ends tail flatten tail end of fish body attach rainbow yarn three rounds from tail on dorsal side single_crochet in last three rounds on one side of tail then first three of ventral side chain 4 skip one single_crochet and treble_crochet in next chain 4 fasten_off leaving a little yarn flopping loose attach yarn on 1st single_crochet on
